item.title: 因NBA操盘丑闻余波 PointsBet在安大略省将被暂停运营
item.description: 安大略省博彩监管机构已采取行动，暂时吊销PointsBet加拿大子公司的注册资格。此前这家在线体育博彩运营商被指控未上报与2024年操纵投注事件相关的可疑投注记录，该事件涉及多伦多猛龙队一名球员。【原文：Ontario’s gambling regulator moved to temporarily suspend the registration of PointsBet’s Canada subsidiary after the online sportsbook operator allegedly failed to report suspicious wagers related to a 2024 bet-rigging scheme involving a Toronto Raptors player.】

item.title: OpenAI推出首款采用英伟达竞争对手Cerebras芯片的模型
item.description: OpenAI正推出其首个基于半导体初创公司Cerebras Systems芯片运行的人工智能模型，这是ChatGPT开发商为拓展合作芯片制造商范围（除英伟达公司外）所采取的举措之一。【原文：OpenAI is releasing its first artificial intelligence model that runs on chips from semiconductor startup Cerebras Systems Inc., part of a push by the ChatGPT maker to broaden the pool of chipmakers it works with beyond Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 私人信贷在SaaS末日来临前就已问题重重
item.description: 已经不是2021年了。【原文：It’s not 2021 anymore.】

item.title: 谷歌称DeepThink人工智能可协作处理高阶数学与科学问题
item.description: Alphabet公司表示，其已更新Gemini Deep Think人工智能模型，以提升该模型在数学和科学研究领域的表现。【原文：Alphabet Inc. has updated its Gemini Deep Think artificial intelligence model for better performance in math and science research, the company said.】

item.title: 燃料公司Arko Petroleum在2亿美元IPO后首日下跌1%
item.description: 阿科石油公司股票开盘价较首次公开募股价格下跌1.4%，此前这家燃料批发商在美国首次公开募股中筹集了2亿美元。【原文：Arko Petroleum Corp., shares opened 1.4% below their IPO price, after the fuel wholesaler raised $200 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 大豆价格升至11月以来最高水平，中美谈判成为焦点
item.description: 大豆期货价格升至11月18日以来的最高水平，交易员们正密切关注美国总统特朗普与习近平主席会晤前，美国对华大豆供应可能进一步增加的潜在影响。【原文：Soybean futures reached the highest levels since Nov. 18 as traders eyed the potential for further sales of American supplies to China ahead a meeting between US President Donald Trump and his counterpart Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 谷歌因搜索广告定价问题遭欧盟反垄断调查
item.description: 谷歌因涉嫌在搜索引擎上非法操纵广告价格，正面临欧盟新一轮调查。此前欧盟已对其处以数十亿欧元的反垄断罚款。【原文：Google, the target for billions of euros in European Union antitrust fines, has been hit by a fresh EU probe over concerns it’s illegally rigging the cost of advertising on its search engine.】

item.title: 芝加哥将出售未缴费用产生的债务，尽管买家尚不确定
item.description: 芝加哥正计划出售约10亿美元债务，这些债务源于未缴停车罚单等欠款。与此同时，该市一位高级财政官员警告称，此次史无前例的债券发行预计成本高昂，且投资者需求尚不明朗。【原文：Chicago is seeking to sell about $1 billion in debt the city is owed from things like unpaid parking tickets even as a top finance official warns the unprecedented offering is expected to be costly with uncertain investor appetite.】

item.description:

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率小幅下调，30年期贷款利率降至6.09%
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率时隔一个月首次回落，住房可负担性正逐步改善。【原文：US mortgage rates fell for the first time in a month as housing affordability slowly improves.】

item.title: 比特币暴跌暴露布克莱的豪赌并冲击萨尔瓦多债务
item.description: 比特币暴跌对萨尔瓦多的冲击尤为剧烈，暴露了总统纳伊布·布克莱高风险拥抱加密货币的风险，并使该国债务市场剧烈震荡。【原文：Bitcoin’s crash has hit few places as hard as El Salvador, exposing the risks of President Nayib Bukele’s high-stakes embrace of crypto and whipsawing the country’s debt markets.】

item.title: 政治因素渗入奥运会：乌克兰选手因头盔问题遭禁赛
item.description: 俯卧在平底雪橇上，准备头朝下俯冲冰道时，钢架雪车运动员弗拉迪斯拉夫·赫拉什凯维奇在冬奥会训练中始终戴着头盔——盔面印着乌克兰同胞的肖像，这些同胞在俄罗斯入侵祖国期间不幸遇难。【原文：Lying face-down on a flat sled, ready to lunge head-first down an ice track, skeleton athlete Vladyslav Heraskevych wore a helmet during his training sessions for the Winter Olympics featuring images of fellow Ukrainians who had died during Russia’s invasion of his country.】

item.title: 育碧预订量超预期，产品组合重组中
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司公布的财年第三季度净预订额超出分析师预期，这得益于《刺客信条》等该游戏发行商最受欢迎系列作品的强劲需求。【原文：Ubisoft Entertainment SA reported net bookings that beat analysts’ estimates in the fiscal third quarter, buoyed by strong demand for the video game publisher’s most popular franchises such as Assassin’s Creed.】

item.title: 富国银行称钢铁关税将推动美国工业并购活动
item.description: 富国银行分析师指出，特朗普总统对进口钢铁征收的关税将推动美国金属行业今年并购活动升温。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs on foreign imports of steel will fuel mergers and acquisitions in the US metals industry this year, according to a Wells Fargo & Co. analyst.】

item.title: 暗色鸡肉在美国菜单上日益流行，普利格姆普莱斯公司首席执行官如是说
item.description: 随着蛋白质价格飙升，深色鸡肉——这种曾被鸡胸肉掩盖风头的部位——正逐渐成为餐厅菜单上的节省成本之选。【原文：As protein prices surge, dark chicken meat — once overshadowed by breast meat — is emerging as a cost-saving option on restaurant menus.】

item.title: 沙特任命公共投资基金负责人为主管外商直接投资事务的部长
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯任命法赫德·阿勒赛义夫为新任投资部长，将该国主权财富基金的一名官员推上掌舵之位，负责为国家吸引更多资本。【原文：Saudi Arabia has appointed Fahad Al-Saif as its new investment minister, putting an official from the kingdom’s sovereign wealth fund at the helm of the entity tasked with drawing more capital to the country.】

item.title: 索尼新款耳塞带来全新设计与顶级降噪体验
item.description: 索尼集团公司推出了其最新款高端无线耳塞，采用重新设计的结构并搭载主动降噪技术，与苹果公司的AirPods Pro 3形成直接竞争（且性能常更胜一筹）。【原文：Sony Group Corp. introduced its latest pair of premium wireless earbuds, offering a retooled design and active noise cancellation that goes head to head with (and often outperforms) Apple Inc.’s AirPods Pro 3.】

item.title: 据称芬兰OP银行通过大宗交易增持Noba银行股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，芬兰金融集团OP Pohjola已增持Noba银行集团股份。此前该集团通过瑞典银行首次公开募股成为其第三大股东仅数月之久。【原文：Finnish financial group OP Pohjola has raised its stake in Noba Bank Group AB, according to people familiar with the matter, just months after becoming the third-largest shareholder through the Swedish lender’s initial public offering.】

item.title: 日本软银旗下支付应用PayPay正式提交美国IPO申请
item.description: 软银集团旗下数字支付服务商PayPay公司已正式提交美国IPO申请，这可能成为日本企业在美国股市有史以来规模最大的上市交易。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp.’s digital payments provider PayPay Corp. has filed publicly for a US IPO, in what could be the biggest ever listing for a Japanese company on a US stock exchange.】

item.title: 欧洲水泥股下跌，因担忧欧盟政策将冲击价格
item.description: 水泥股延续近期跌势，因市场猜测欧盟将推迟收紧碳排放管控，这削弱了已转向绿色生产模式的企业定价能力。【原文：Cement stocks extended recent declines on speculation the European Union will delay tightening its carbon controls, reducing the pricing power of firms that have transitioned toward greener practices.】

item.title: Nscale从太平洋投资管理公司和蓝猫资本获得14亿美元芯片贷款
item.description: 数据中心初创企业Nscale宣布获得14亿美元融资，投资方包括太平洋投资管理公司和蓝猫资本公司。该公司表示，这笔资金将用于采购芯片，这些芯片将租赁给客户使用。【原文：Data center startup Nscale has secured a $1.4 billion financing from lenders including Pacific Investment Management Co. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. to fund chip purchases that will be leased to customers, according to a statement.】

item.title: 美国移民与海关执法局最大承包商Geo集团或将抹去所有"特朗普交易"收益
item.description: 私营监狱运营商Geo集团的股价正面临回吐特朗普胜选后曾创下的可观涨幅，因政府移民政策引发的强烈反对情绪正令该公司前景蒙上阴影。【原文：Shares of private prison operator Geo Group are on track to erase a once-hefty gain that came after President Donald Trump’s election victory, as growing backlash over the administration’s immigration policy clouds the company’s prospects.】

item.title: 拉里·芬克的私募资产押注推动全球家族办公室热潮
item.description: 全球基建合伙公司（Global Infrastructure Partners）背后的前瑞信银行家们，最广为人知的是他们打造了全球最大的投资公司之一。如今，他们正在开创另一项事业：家族办公室。【原文：The ex-Credit Suisse bankers behind Global Infrastructure Partners are best-known for building one of the world’s largest investment firms. Now they’re also forging something else: family offices.】

item.title: 埃及降息周期延续至新年，通胀压力缓解
item.description: 埃及将降息周期延长至2026年，此举受到数月来最低通胀率和本币走强的推动。【原文：Egypt extended a cycle of interest-rate cuts into 2026, encouraged by the lowest inflation in months and a stronger local currency.】

item.title: 城堡公司启动两部分美国债券发售以再融资债务
item.description: 城堡公司周四启动两部分美国债券发售计划以偿还债务，所得款项可能还将用于与其多策略基金相关的一般企业用途。【原文：Citadel LLC kicked off a two-part US bond sale on Thursday to repay debt, with the proceeds potentially also earmarked for general corporate purposes tied to its multi-strategy funds.】

item.title: 尽管利率走低，美国二手房销售量仍创四年最大跌幅
item.description: 美国1月份二手房销售量出现近四年最大跌幅，当月不仅遭遇历史性低温，还经历了一场大规模冬季风暴。【原文：Sales of previously owned US homes fell in January by the most in nearly four years, a month marked by historically cold temperatures and a massive winter storm.】

item.title: 监狱供应商TKC借款23亿美元用于再融资和派发股息
item.description: 监狱食品供应商TKC控股公司周三通过发行垃圾债券和杠杆贷款筹集近23亿美元资金，用于再融资现有债务并向其私募股权所有者支付股息。【原文：Prison-food vendor TKC Holdings Inc. borrowed nearly $2.3 billion on Wednesday in a junk bond and leveraged loan deal to refinance existing debt and pay a dividend to its private equity owner.】

item.title: 美国股市基准指数反弹，交易员重启"风险偏好"策略
item.description: 美国股市周四开盘反弹，此前连续两个交易日下跌，因劳动力市场在失业救济申请数据中显现稳定迹象。【原文：US equities rebounded at Thursday’s open after two sessions of declines as the labor market showed signs of stabilization in jobless claims.】

item.title: 墨西哥地方债务复兴始于18亿美元墨西哥国家石油公司交易
item.description: 墨西哥国家石油公司时隔六年再度以比索借款，部分投资者认为此举可能为当地债务市场迎来至少二十年来最繁忙的时期。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos is back to borrowing in pesos for the first time in six years, a move that some investors say could usher in the busiest season for local debt markets in at least two decades.】

item.title: 安科拉在华纳兄弟之争中可多方取胜
item.description: 安科拉控股集团——这家激进投资者周三突然加入华纳兄弟探索公司的收购战——因频频现身于高调并购案而引发轰动。【原文：Ancora Holdings Group — the activist investor that jumped into the takeover fight for Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. Wednesday — has made a splash by showing up in high-profile M&A situations.】
